name: Baratie

keyEvents.description: Mihawk arrives at the Baratie, pursuing Don Krieg's fleet.
keyEvents.significance: Brings a Grand Line level threat to the East Blue restaurant.

keyEvents.description: The legendary duel between Zoro and Mihawk takes place in the waters near the Baratie.
keyEvents.significance: Becomes the setting for one of the most iconic fights in One Piece history.

keyEvents.description: Don Krieg begins his invasion of the Baratie after Mihawk departs.
keyEvents.significance: The Baratie becomes the battleground for the arc's climactic conflict.

description: A floating restaurant ship in the East Blue, famous for its fighting cooks and quality cuisine.
significance: The setting for the Baratie arc and where Sanji joins the Straw Hat crew.
